sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: Funding under this investments supports the Australian Government's obligation to support to the implementation and effective operation of the Convention on Cluster Munitions and the Anti-Personnel Mine Ban Convention (otherwise know at the Ottawa Convention).  Funding supports thetransparency through the  International Campaign to Ban Landmines â€“ Cluster Munitions Coalition (ICBL-CMC), a defacto monitor of these convention reporting annually on usage, stockpiles, clearance and victim assistance. ICBL-CMC also plays a strong advocacy role and participates and supports engagement with developing countries to ensure the effective function on the conventions. The total value of this investment is $0.5 million over 3 years, starting 2017-18.
